name: piratically
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that is typical of a pirate (= a person who attacks ships in order to steal from them): He is a piratically handsome figure with a long, black beard and a gold ring hanging from each ear. The men were charged with piratically seizing the ship.
More examplesFewer examplesHe was dressed piratically in a leather waistcoat, with a scarlet bandana on his head.He cackled piratically as he disappeared along the corridor.He was a fraudster who preyed piratically on elderly people.
